attributes.action: We want David Cameron to Take back his resignation.
attributes.additional_details:
*Sterling Falls to 31 year low against the dollar 
*Jobs have been lost,
*Imports are now expensive
*Taxes and Interest Rates may increase
*Lots and Lots of trouble ahead...!!!!
attributes.background: As everybody knows that the Country is going through an economic Turmoil after the BREXIT and we can’t see anyone capable enough in the Westminster to take this country out of the crises  We request David Cameron to take back his resignation and put this country back on its feet.

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister, including the Prime Minister, is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole. It is a decision for the individual concerned. The UK Government or Parliament cannot stop a Minister resigning.
